content.raw:
I incorrectly thought that repo metadata was stored together with packages. In fact it is store under /var/lib instead of /var/cache, which makes sense with the needed of having the repo enabled to remove packages.

Should be fixed now. Thanks.
content.html:
I incorrectly thought that repo metadata was stored together with packages. In fact it is store under /var/lib instead of /var/cache, which makes sense with the needed of having the repo enabled to remove packages.

Should be fixed now. Thanks.
